sentences.cn: 销售情况立即出现喜人景象.

sentences.en: Technical sizzle go a long way towards accomplishing this, but it's far from the whole story.
sentences.cn: 要做到这一点,巧妙的手段会起很大的作用, 但远远不是故事的全部.

sentences.en: The sausages and burgers sizzled on the barbecue.
sentences.cn: 香肠和肉饼在烤架上咝咝作响。

sentences.en: The vegetables dropped into the boiling oil with a sizzle.
sentences.cn: 欻拉一声,把菜倒进了滚油锅里.

sentences.en: They used to sizzle each other.
sentences.cn: 他们过去常常互相谩骂.

sentences.en: Why you skip it: Your sweat session might not sizzle as many calories as you think.
sentences.cn: 为什么不可取: 出汗所燃烧的卡路里可能不会像你想象的那么多.

trans.tran_en: If something such as hot oil or fat sizzles, it makes hissing sounds

trans.tran_cn: 发咝咝声，表现良好，进行顺利
